Key Match Events: Peyton Watson blocked a shot in the final second to seal the 124-122 win for the Nuggets, handing the Thunder their first loss of the season
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets rebounded from a 16-point deficit in the third quarter, with Nikola Jokic finishing with 23 points, 20 rebounds, and 16 assists
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder allowed 69 points in the second half, their worst defensive performance of the season
The Nuggets were without power forward Aaron Gordon (strained calf) and point guard Jamal Murray (concussion protocol)
Others: Russell Westbrook scored 29 points, Peyton Watson had a chance to seal the game at the line with 16 seconds left but missed both free throws
Michael Porter Jr. scored 21 of his 24 points in the second half
